active_by_default.description: Whether this power starts in the on or off state.
active_by_default.markdownDescription: Whether this power starts in the on or off state.

strength.description: How strong the night vision effect is. Range: 0.0 - 1.0.
strength.markdownDescription: How strong the night vision effect is. Range: 0.0 - 1.0.

key.description: Which active key this power should respond to. If none is specified, this power will use the primary active power key (by default G).
key.markdownDescription: Which active key this power should respond to. If none is specified, this power will use the primary active power key (by default G).

type.description:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/toggle_night_vision)

Defines a [Night Vision (Power Type)](night_vision.md) which can be toggled on and off with the specified [Key](../data_types/key.md).

Type ID: `origins:toggle_night_vision`
